H0.text: The Estoril Grand Prix circuit is in which European country. Portugal

H1.text: The Estoril Grand Prix circuit is in which European country. Spain

H2.text: The Estoril Grand Prix circuit is in which European country. Italy

H3.text: The Estoril Grand Prix circuit is in which European country. Potiti

A4.text: The Circuito do Estoril or Autódromo do Estoril (Estoril Circuit), officially known as Autódromo Fernanda Pires da Silva, is a motorsport race track on the Portuguese Riviera, outside of Lisbon, owned by state-run holding management company Parpública.

A5.text: The circuit was the home of the Formula One Portuguese Grand Prix from 1984 to 1996.
